short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Papa’s Pizzeria Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте "Папа Пицерия Оригинал" като разширение за Chrome - Можете да играете и без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juga a Papa's Pizzeria Original com a una extensió de Chrome - També pots jugar sense internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte Papa's Pizzeria Original jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to hned teď!
short.da: Spil Papa's Pizzeria Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Du kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Jouez à Papa's Pizzeria Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.el: Juega a Papa's Pizzeria Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega a Papa's Pizzeria Original como una extensión de Chrome: ¡También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.et: Mängi Papa's Pizzeria originaali kui Chrome'i laiendust - Samuti saab mängida ilma internetita, proovi kohe!
short.fi: Pelaa Papa’s Pizzeria Originalia Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Papa's Pizzeria Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin itong i-play nang walang Internet, subukan ito…
short.fr: Jouez à Papa's Pizzeria Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant!
short.he,ms: Mainkan Papa's Pizzeria Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.hi: Juega Papa's Pizzeria Original como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.hr: Igrajte Pizzeriju Papa Original kao Chrome ekstenziju - Takođe možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.hu: Játszd a Papa's Pizzeria Originalt Chrome bővítményként - Próbáld ki, akár internet nélkül is!
short.id: Mainkan Papa's Pizzeria Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga bisa Dimainkan tanpa Internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca a Papa's Pizzeria Original come estensione per Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza internet, prova ora!
short.ja: Papa's Pizzeria OriginalをChrome拡張機能としてプレイする- インターネットなしでプレイも可能です。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Papa's Pizzeria Original을 플레이하세요. 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있으니 지금 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite Papa’s Pizzeria Original kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį - Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet Papa's Pizzeria Original kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Arī varat spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģiniet tagad!
short.nl: Jouez à Papa's Pizzeria Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.no: Juega a la versión original de Papa's Pizzeria como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a internet.…
short.pl: Graj w Papa's Pizzeria Original jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz również grać bez Internetu, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Jucați Papa's Pizzeria Original ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, puteți juca fără internet, încercați acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Papa's Pizzeria Original как расширение Chrome - также можете играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Hrajte Papa's Pizzeria Original ako rozšírenie pre Chrome - Tiež môžete hrať bez pripojenia na internet, vyskúšajte to teraz!
short.sl: Speel Papa se Pizzeria Origineel as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan dit ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.sr: Играјте Papa's Pizzeria Original као Хром продужење - Такође можете играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Papa's Pizzeria Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Du kan också spela utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Papa's Pizzeria Original เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นตอนนี้!
short.tr: Juega a Papa's Pizzeria Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.uk: uk]Грайте в оригінальне Papa's Pizzeria як розширення для Chrome - Також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Papa's Pizzeria Original như một tiện ích trình duyệt Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần kết nối Internet, hãy thử ngay…
short.zh_CN: 以 Chrome 扩展程序的形式玩 Papa's Pizzeria 原版游戏 - 还可以离线游玩，立即试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 將Papa’s Pizzeria Original作為Chrome擴充套件來遊玩-也可以在沒有網路的情況下遊玩，現在試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Papa’s Pizzeria 🍕

Welcome to the culinary haven of Papa Louie’s Pizzeria, a popular cooking and time-management game crafted by Flipline Studios! 🎮 In this delectable adventure, players don the chef's hat and step into the world of pizza perfection. Your mission? Take orders, craft mouthwatering pizzas with an array of toppings, and leave your customers craving for more!

Papa's Pizzeria
Game Controls

Mouse: Interact with the game interface, select toppings, and control various elements of pizza preparation. 🖱️
Keyboard (optional): Some actions can be performed using keyboard shortcuts for efficiency. ⌨️
How to Play 🎮

Take Orders: Welcome customers, take their orders, and note their pizza preferences. 🍽️
Pizza Preparation: Customize pizzas by choosing the crust, spreading sauce, adding cheese, and selecting a variety of toppings. 🍅🧀🍕
Bake to Perfection: Place the prepared pizza in the oven and monitor its baking progress to ensure it’s cooked to perfection. 🔥
Cut and Serve: Once baked, carefully cut the pizza into slices and serve it to the waiting customers. 🍽️🍕
Earn Tips and Improve: Receive tips based on your performance and use them to upgrade equipment or expand the pizzeria. 💸🛠️
Tips and Tricks 🚀

Efficient Order Taking: Take orders quickly to serve customers promptly and maximize your earnings. ⏩💰
Perfect Toppings: Pay attention to customers’ topping preferences and create pizzas that match their expectations. 🍅🧀🍖
Time Management: Balance multiple orders efficiently, but don’t sacrifice quality for speed. ⏰
Upgrade Your Pizzeria: Invest in kitchen upgrades and decorations to attract more customers and enhance your workspace. 🛠️🏰
Customer Satisfaction: Aim for high customer satisfaction to earn better tips and unlock new features. 😊🌟
Embark on a pizza-perfect journey and turn Papa’s Pizzeria into the go-to spot for pizza lovers everywhere! 🌍🍕

Explore further gaming alternatives located in the top-left corner.
